### Background

This site list mostly single-cell RNA-seq data sets downloaded from GEO. We store each of the data sets in `ExpressionSet` object and make the data available as an R package on GitHub. 

* [Data description](data-description.html) 


### Single cell RNA-Seq Data packages

* Human
    * Tung et al., 2016, Human iPSC, UMI  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqHumanTungiPSC); [Codes](HumanTungiPSC.html) 
    * Leng et al., 2015, Human ESC, reads  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqHumanLengESC); [Codes](HumanLengESC.html)
    * Patel et al., 2014 (GSE57872), Human Glioblastoma  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqHumanPatelGlioblastoma); [Codes](HumanPatelGlioblastoma.html) 


* Mouse
    * Buettner et al., 2015, mouse ESC, reads  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqMouseBuettnerESC); [Codes](MouseBuettnerESC.html)
    * Jaitin et at., 2014, mouse Spleen cells, UMI  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqMouseJaitinSpleen); [Codes](MouseJaitinSpleen.html)
    * Treutlein et al., 2014, mouse lung cells, reads  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqMouseTreutleinLung); [Codes](MouseTreutleinLung.html)
    * Scialdone et al., 2015, mouse liver cells  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqMouseScialdoneLiver); [Codes](MouseScialdoneLiver.html)
    * Zeisel et al., 2015, mouse brain, UMI  
      [GitHub](https://github.com/jhsiao999/singleCellRNASeqMouseZeiselBrain); [Codes](MouseZeiselBrain.html)
